üîß Troubleshooting

If the main app shows a blank screen:

  1. Click "Clear Storage & Go to App" above
  2. Open browser Developer Tools (F12)
  3. Check Console tab for errors
  4. Refresh the page (Ctrl+R or Cmd+R)

WebSocket errors are normal - the app will use HTTP API instead.
